notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or was moved.

delegate.description: Please choose an address as your voting delegate. The delegate will vote on your behalf with your balance.
delegate.title: Set Voting Delegate

governanceParams.proposalThresholdHelp: Minimum voting power required for an address to create a proposal.
governanceParams.quorumPercentHelp: Percentage of total voting power that must participate for a proposal to be valid.
governanceParams.votingDelayHelp: Blocks between proposal creation and voting start. Gives members time to prepare.
governanceParams.votingPeriodHelp: Number of blocks during which votes can be cast.

proposal.batchMintHint: Enter multiple recipient addresses and amounts. Empty rows are ignored.
proposal.createDescription: Create a new proposal for the community to vote on

err.noBatchRows: Please add at least one batch row.

govFnHelp.setProposalThreshold: Adjust the minimum voting power required to create proposals.
govFnHelp.setVotingDelay: Adjust number of blocks between proposal creation and when voting starts.
govFnHelp.setVotingPeriod: Adjust number of blocks during which voting is open.

proposal.governorSettingHint: These values are raw units (blocks or token units). Ensure they are correct before submitting.

indexing.finalFail: Indexer timeout. Please retry later or check explorer.
indexing.onChainFound: Proposal exists on-chain. Waiting for indexer…
indexing.probingChain: Subgraph not yet indexed. Probing chain…
indexing.stale: Still indexing. Data will appear shortly.

proposal.quorumHelp: Quorum = (total voting supply at the proposal snapshot / start block) * quorumPercent. Undelegated tokens still count toward total supply (they increase the absolute quorum requirement) even if they themselves have no delegated voting power. This value is the absolute participation threshold (For + Abstain).
proposal.title: Title

typeHelp.batchMint: Distribute tokens to multiple addresses in a single proposal.
typeHelp.budget: If approved, the applicant address will receive the requested amount of {{token}} with spending authority.
typeHelp.mint: Distribute tokens directly to the specified recipient (one address).

vote.needVotingPower: You need voting power to vote.

proposalStatusDetail.active: Voting is currently open. Votes are being accepted until the deadline block.
proposalStatusDetail.canceled: Proposal was canceled before completion and will not proceed.
proposalStatusDetail.closed: Proposal lifecycle is finished (generic terminal state).
proposalStatusDetail.defeated: Voting ended and the proposal did not reach the required support/quorum.
proposalStatusDetail.executed: All proposal actions have been successfully executed on-chain.
proposalStatusDetail.expired: Proposal was not executed within the allowed time window and has expired.
proposalStatusDetail.pending: Voting has not started yet. Waiting for the voting start block.
proposalStatusDetail.queued: Proposal is queued/timelocked and will be executable after the delay.
proposalStatusDetail.succeeded: Voting ended with sufficient support and quorum. It can proceed to queue/execute.

proposalThreshold.notEnough: You need at least {{needed}} tokens to create a proposal.

wallet.userRejected: You rejected the transaction in your wallet.
